Posts.Content: May 15, 2018 09:49PM WRS wrote: This might seem silly, but I realized after visiting a friend this week ---- NO SHOES worn in the house. So many germs from all over the place are on the soles. Maybe you do this already but it sure can cut down on bacteria in the home. Haven't started chemo yet, but practicing now :-)
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo May 2018 ClareCo cccmc2
